metadata.title: CVE-2017-5580 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The parse_instruction function in gallium/auxiliary/tgsi/tgsi_text.c invirglrenderer before 0.6.0 allows local guest OS users to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds array access and process crash) via a craftedtexture instruction.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5580` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer0 - 0.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0-2').
